Project Experience

Ongoing Research Projects

Past Research Projects

  • PIM-NPU Based Processing System Software Developments for Hyper-scale Neural Network Processing
    • Development of workload partitioning and resource scheduling algorithms for the NPU-PIM architecture
    • Implementation of an SDK for an integrated NPU-PIM architecture.
    • Related publications: [C4], [C5], [C6]
    • Sponsor: Ministry of Science and ICT, South Korea (March. 2023 - Present)
    • Role: Research participant
  • PIM-NPU Architecture for Inference of Hyper-Scale Neural Network Processing
    • Development of an NPU-PIM integrated architecture that effectively supports both capabilities.
    • Implementation of a both functionality and cycle-accurate NPU-PIM simulator.
    • Sponsor: SK Telecom (Now SAPEON Inc.), South Korea (Nov. 2021 - Mar. 2023)
    • Related publications: [C5], [C6]
    • Role: Research participant
  • Deep Learning for AI Vision Inspection in Semiconductor Manufacturing and Deep Learning Toolkits.
    • Development of accurate weakly-supervised object detection algorithm and efficient Transformer network
    • Implementation of object detection and segmentation toolbox and library (TensorFlow)
    • Related publications: [C2], [C3]
    • Sponsor: LG Display, South Korea (July. 2020 - July. 2022)
    • Role: Research participant
  • Host-side DRAM Controller for PIM
    • Development of a host-side compatible PIM controller.
    • Implementation of an emulation environment using FPGA for the verification of the PIM controller in RTL-level.
    • Related publications: [C1]
    • Sponsor: SK Hynix, South Korea (July. 2020 - June. 2021)
    • Role: Research participant
  • Configurable Deep Learning Inference Hardware Accelerator Development with FPGA
    • Configurable accelerator using FPGA for several CNN networks
    • Development of a neural network quantization and pruning platform suitable for hardware based (TensorFlow)
    • Sponsor: LG Display, South Korea (Aug. 2019 - Jul. 2020)
    • Role: Research participant
    • I joined this project on Mar. 2020
